illness.name: Allergies
illness.symptoms: Sneezing; Runny or blocked nose; Red, itchy, watery eyes, Wheezing; Coughing

illness.name: COVID-19
illness.symptoms: Ferver; Coughing; Loss of/Change in smell/taste

illness.name: Diabetes
illness.symptoms: Very thirsty; Urinating more frequently, particularly at night; Tiredness; Weight loss; Blurred vision; Cuts/Wounds heal slowly; Itching around the penis or vagina

illness.name: Ebola
illness.symptoms: Ferver; Headache; Muscle pain; Sore throat; Muscle weakness; Vomiting; Diarrhoea; Stomachache

illness.name: Food poisoning
illness.symptoms: Nausea; Vomiting; Diarrhoea; Ferver; Stomachache; Loss of appetite; Muscle pain

illness.name: Gout
illness.symptoms: Joints pain; Joint feeling hot and tender; Swelling in and around the affected joint; Red, shiny skin over the affected joint

illness.name: HIV
illness.symptoms: Ferver; Sore throat; Body rash; Tiredness; Joint pain; Muscle pain; Swollen glands (nodes); Weight loss; Diarrhoea; recurrent infections

illness.name: Alzheimer
illness.symptoms: Problems with speech or language; Confusion, getting lost in familiar places; Memory problems; Insomnia (problems sleeping)

illness.name: Parkinson
illness.symptoms: Hand/arm shaking; Slowness of movement; Muscle stiffness; Balance problems; Insomnia (problems sleeping);

illness.name: Appendicitis
illness.symptoms: Pain at your lower right-hand side; Nausea; Loss of appetite; Diarrhoea; Ferver

illness.name: High blood pressure
illness.symptoms: Headache; Nosebleed; Chest pain; Blurred vision; Insomnia (problems sleeping); Difficulty breathing; Irregular heartbeat

illness.name: Hepatitis A
illness.symptoms: Tiredness; Fever; Muscle pain; Joint pain; Loss of appetite; Nausea; Itchy skin; Yellowing of the skin and eyes

illness.name: Hepatitis B
illness.symptoms: Tiredness; Fever, Muscle pain; Joint pain; Loss of appetite; Nausea; Diarrhoea; Yellowing of the skin and eyes; Stomachache

illness.name: Hepatitis C
illness.symptoms: Tiredness; Fever, Muscle pain; Joint pain; Loss of appetite; Nausea; Stomachache
